title: War of the Roses: Two Wine Glasses
description: Elyse was Facetiming with her boyfriend Mark while he was away on a business trip and noticed there were two wine glasses in the background.  When she asked him about it he just kept avoiding the question.  Her intuition kicked in and she did something that some people are calling crazy and some are saying is justified.  Find out what she did and if he's cheating on War of the Roses!
